body.name: Red Kap unisex-adult Kp70
features: Origin Made in the USA or Imported

CLASSIC COMFORT: Made with 5 oz. performance cotton/poly blend poplin, this lightweight, breathable lab coat features elastic cuffs designed to protect your wrists, plus an exterior left chest pocket & two lower exterior pockets for plenty of storage.

TRIED & TRUE DURABILITY: Our coats are finished with a Durable Press wrinkle-resistant coating that requires minimal pressing or ironing. They're constructed with UV non-yellowing buttons for long-lasting whiteness through industrial laundry processing

EVERYDAY EXCELLENCE: Our workwear collection is designed for the work you do everyday. Stronger seams. More durable fabrics. Pockets in just the right places. With so many features that help you get the job done, our workwear definitely has what it takes.

WORKWEAR DONE RIGHT: Red Kap knows all about "done right." We’ve been creating comfortable, durable workwear since starting out as a family business back in 1923. Today, we outfit 16 million Americans who apply their hands & hearts to all kinds of jobs.

Every Red Kap garment must pass rigorous testing for proof of excellence in design, engineering and construction. Compare our quality to similar garments from Carhartt, Workrite, Goodthreads, Chefworks, Cintas, Cherokee, Magellan or Duluth Trading Company
body.description: This lab coat is off the charts with all our best material production features. Lab, medical facility, and clinic workers will appreciate the knit cuffs that keep sleeves from interfering with work and extended back coverage to protect from messy jobs. Plus, who doesn't need the storage offered by a chest pocket and two lower pockets? Put this lab coat to the test and see why it’s a customer favorite.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #25,760 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #4 in Men's Medical Lab Coats

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Served it's purpose!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for a pathogenic microbiology class. I like that it has snaps instead of buttons. I love the fitted, stretch, sweatshirt like cuffs (a huge plus when working with potentially dangerous pathogens!), and it was mid-weight and repelled quite a lot of the dyes I used. Easy to wash, wrinkle resistant (kept it stored wadded up in my backpack after washing and looked perfect each time), and it was rather long. I'm 5'4 and it went down below my knees. It is sized generously and I suggest one size down. The collar doesn't roll or turn up at the ends which is nice so it doesn't need ironing. I wish it had pocket slits and a back slit for a little more movement. Getting up and down from my stool was a little challenging at times but not bad. Oh and the front pockets are generously sized but no breast pocket. Didn't miss not having one. Great buy! It's a keeper! I'll probably just have it fitted and embroidered once I finish med school because I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well with room to spare
reviews.reviewText: I really like this lab coat. Good quality thick material. Long. The sleeves are cuffed which is the main reason I chose this one, and 3 pockets! Perfect for lab in microbiology and I’ll order a 2nd for chemistry. If it helps anyone choose a size - I’m a size M 155 lbs and 5’6. True to size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Big but nice
reviews.reviewText: First, this is a very nice lab coat for just about any need. After reading the comments, I was advised to size down; this is a must. I ordered a size small and it was still larger than desired, however, the extra length was nice. I’m 5 2 and the length was roughly to my calves. The cuffs around the wrists are wonderful though; great functionality. The snaps also make it an easy on-and-off, which is nice when dealing with harmful bacteria and tools. Lastly, there is a pocket in the front, great for holding pens, badges, etc. Overall, I recommend the purchase, but you must size down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice material and it fit great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Opened the package nice lab coat came with a giant live spider. Not kidding it was alive and huge. Not a tarantula but almost that size. Was very surprised to see that crawling and running around the back of the lab coat when I opened it. Other than that it is a nice lab coat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The cuffed wrists and click buttons!!
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoyed this lab coat for my A&P class, (which we had cadavers), and the cuffed wrists were sooooo nice to have. Not only that, but the click buttons instead of plastic buttons were very nice and very efficient as far as time goes. Overall, an excellent lab coat and would most certainly purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits good, works well
reviews.reviewText: Does its job, isn't too expensive, and is honestly pretty comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my College Labs
reviews.reviewText: I bought this coat for my Animal Anat&Phys Lab at college and it worked great!! I never had to worry about anything getting underneath my sleeves because of the compression around the wrists and it didn’t shrink in the wash! Worked great for the semester
Identifiquen bien las tallas ya que la que llegó estaba muy grande, y después pedimos una mas pequeña y esa si quedó muy bien. Y se está usando en trabajos de laboratorioExcelente
Fit is good but disappointed in the snaps to stay closed. Not strong enough to work efficiently if your in a constantly moving they are not the best.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent lab coat for university chemistry
reviews.reviewText: This lab coat is very good quality and arrived quickly. It has snaps which the professor was insistent upon for safety purposes and the cuffed stretchy sleeves provide additional safety and comfort too. The fit is slim and not too bulky for my 19 year old female chem student. For reference she is 5"10 135 lbs and we bought a small. Excellent price too. Buy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 19, 2021
reviews.reviewText: It’s fine even though a little too lose it’s better than it being uncomfortable
